website_summaries.verdict: An excellent choice if you want to make customized crafts with iron-ons. Easy to use, transport, and store.
pros: An updated version of one of the brand's top machines, it enables you to transform iron-ons to a variety of materials
cons: Some owners gripe that it loses heat while in use, resulting in the need to press several times for intended results

customer_reviews.title: Expensive piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a piece of junk. It worked fine for about 2 weeks then the temperature kept going up and up surpassing what we had set it for. It will also periodically drop in temperature and then jump around +/- 10 degrees. Too expensive not to work properly. Buy at your own risk.
customer_reviews.author: Our opinion

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product
customer_reviews.text: I got the 12x12 press and it made applying large decals to t-shirts an effortless job. Amazing quality.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this heat press!
customer_reviews.text: Love the convenience of this heat press. My work space is limited and this is not bulky and easy to store out of the way when not in use. So glad I purchased this and not a standard heat press. Love the fact that I can take it with me anywhere. I’ve made several shirts and the heat is even and does a great job!
customer_reviews.author: kcrl

customer_reviews.title: Look elsewhere
customer_reviews.text: I had this not even one month and only used it a few times. It stopped working, and would not heat up again. I found the cord to always getting in the way of pressing. I would not purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: W W

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great
customer_reviews.text: I bought it for home use. I was considering a low-end commercial heat press but learned that unless you spend $600+ they heat unevenly when they do finally heat up. This heats up fast, has a time, turns off automatically, and turns off when you're not using it after 10 minutes, and has nice even heat. Easy to store away.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fujioka

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use and a quality product
customer_reviews.text: This product (12x10 model) works great. We have used this product for approximately 6+ months now. Before buying we actually had watched a few YouTube videos on comparisons between this and a regular heat press. It seems that there weren't any dramatic differences in function per say, but the Cricut had advantages in ease of use and being mobile. Actual heat distribution comparisons were in favor of the Cricut as well. For someone just starting out in vinyl work this is a great product to start with...although it can be a little pricey. We have made several cups, bags, and shirts and haven't had any problems. This has been a great product for us.
customer_reviews.author: Adam

customer_reviews.title: Paid for new. Got used. Works but damaged
customer_reviews.text: Easy to use. Works with Siser Easyweed. However, packaging was horrible. It appeared to be thrown in a box with very little packaging bubbles. Not in a separate box or anything. I paid for new and item appears to be used. There is a scratch on the plate the heats up(pictured). The cord was dirty. There were two rips in the bag that comes with it(pictured). Overall it works but to pay for new and receive used and damaged is a rip off. However, it works or I’d give it 1 star. If it wasn’t too late to return and buy from the cricut website, I would. Product overall is great. Can’t say the same for shipping or seller honesty.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gale

customer_reviews.title: Easy Press, not so easy pressing
customer_reviews.text: I am only giving this 4 stars because I don't think it is so easy to press as advertised. On all the forums people say you shouldn't have to lay on it for good pressure, but I have to lay on it for good adhesion and may others have to do the same. Kinda wish I would have just purchased a heat press.
customer_reviews.author: Becky B.

customer_reviews.title: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: This is by far the easiest and fastest heat press machine I've ever used... it was a great purchase well worth the money and time... I'm ABSOLUTELY ecstatic to use it every chance I get
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Overheating after 2 months terrible customer service
customer_reviews.text: Worked great for about two months now it’s overheating and burning/melting everything it touches. It won’t hold temperature it just over heats. It’s useless now. Customer service is terrible. I bought a off brand press to finish my orders and it works better than this one ever did.
customer_reviews.author: Fitzroy Thompson

customer_reviews.title: Very disappointed
customer_reviews.text: After only using 3 times the digital display is not showing and the vinyl has came off of everything. I am not happy with this at all and after reading more about it this is a common problem. Amazon was awesome about it and took care of the problem. Now to go back to the big bulky press.
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany

customer_reviews.title: It broke within 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Used this less than 3 months then the temperature control went out. I didn't notice and burned 2 items. Trying to see how to get a replacement now.
customer_reviews.author: Magnoliamg

customer_reviews.title: Super helpful!
customer_reviews.text: I've done some iron-on shirts without this EasyPress, and they...could have gone better. (I mean, I got the job done... but I'm 100% sure that some parts of the iron-on were more...ironed-on than others, and to compensate I over-ironed everything, and the shirts weren't too happy about that. - Everyone survived though and the shirts were cute though). But with this, I feel confident, things are easy and seamless, and everything is done evenly and precisely! I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: If you were considering a heat press, buy this! It is compact, yet big enough to do a t-shirt. The first time using it last weekend and I already made three t-shirts! Very easy to use. I do wish it had a detachable power cord. That would make it so much better. Given the choices out there, I would definitely buy this again. I like it so much I'm thinking of getting the smallest size for small projects.
customer_reviews.author: Alabama Catlady

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love it! Much easier than an iron and also easier than a standing clothing press(whatever it’s called). Everything stores neatly in the tote bag, including the extra pad and Teflon sheet. Doesn’t take up much storage space. Only wish I’d purchased it sooner.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Parker

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Heat Press
customer_reviews.text: I ended up returning this because I need something that can also print on hats and mugs so I went with other options. Nevertheless, this thing worked flawlessly the few times I did use it. It came with a nice base that's handy while it's hot. Just wish they included a hard top to be able to place the printing material on...
customer_reviews.author: Rubin

customer_reviews.title: Easy-to-use! Great for DIY projects
customer_reviews.text: They don't call it the easy press for nothing. Love this and all my cricut products so far. The cricut website even goes as far as letting you input your base material as well as your heat press materials to know what time and temperature would be the best for your project.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Mahadeo

customer_reviews.title: Hard to set temp and timer
customer_reviews.text: This product needs to be square. I was working with a 12x12 image and I had heat half the project at a time. I did 24 bags and it took forever! Now I did to toddler shirts and it did work very nicely for that project. Also you have to keep mashing the buttons to set the heat and timer. For the price the product should come with a heat paper and the heat cushion. If I have purchased this at a store I would return it but don't want to get kicked off amazon for returning it.
customer_reviews.author: CruiseLady

customer_reviews.title: A great choice and space saver! Easy to use!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It is a great choice for a heat press that actually WORKS well, and takes up very little space. It came with a great bag so think of it like a computer bag that you can tuck away in a closet when not in use. I love that it can be done on your kitchen table (with a mat or towel) and then put away. The quality is great too! I have made multiple bags and shirts and they have done well! Cricut has a great online guide that tells you temp/time/material, so that you just set it and go. I am very satisfied with this purchase and would recommend to others!
customer_reviews.author: Josh & April Purser

customer_reviews.title: Great Press!
customer_reviews.text: Love, love love this! I am having a ball with this press! It is a game changer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected!
customer_reviews.text: Works great!!! I was Worried cause a few reviews I read didn’t sound promising but I’ve used it a bunch of times and different materials and it works great!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Samantha

customer_reviews.title: Too big for totes or shirts.
customer_reviews.text: This press is good for big projects. Its too big for t-shirts and tote bags. If its too hot, it ruins the vinyl by no sticking
customer_reviews.author: Santos Leon

customer_reviews.title: Easy and fast to use.I love it
customer_reviews.text: Best decision ive ever made.its definitely a must have for vinyal,and screen printing to set inks on your fabrics
customer_reviews.author: karen cadorette

customer_reviews.title: Awesome machine
customer_reviews.text: I was up i the air about getting one of these but I am so glad I did!! It makes it so much easier to do my shirts and bags!!
customer_reviews.author: christina brooks

customer_reviews.title: GREAT product but needs to lower the price
customer_reviews.text: The price is definitely a lot. That being said it has great temperature control constant on the bottom. I will pay extra for that. Works great with iron-ons and vinyl. I have been using mine like a work horse.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Like it but don’t love it
customer_reviews.text: I like that is transportable and like a huge iron. I dislike that you have to apply your own pressure. I do not own an industrial heat press but I see that you don’t have to hold them down. The easy press is hurting my wrist from applying pressure.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney

customer_reviews.title: Love this thing
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful and impressive. I love it for tshirts but also for pressing yardage for quilts. I'm thinking of getting a smaller size for pressing quilt piecing.
customer_reviews.author: Wendi

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! Went back and forth between this and a heat press in the same price range for safety reasons I went with the easy press and it hasn’t disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Michele

customer_reviews.title: DON’T WASTE YOUR MONEY
customer_reviews.text: Absolute pile of garbage. Worked great just long enough that I couldn’t return it through amazon. Now it overheats and throws error codes making it nearly impossible to use. It has ruined several customer projects and has easily cost me hundreds of dollars between lost revenue and damaged products. Cricut is absolutely horrible to deal with as far as customer service goes and I wish nothing but the worst for their entire company.
customer_reviews.author: This guy

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars
customer_reviews.text: Machine works as expected and instructions are easy to follow. You can follow YouTube for other settings for different materials. I got the largest size.
customer_reviews.author: Kristie

customer_reviews.title: Faulty Unit
customer_reviews.text: Received this brand new out of the box and had to return it cause it would not heat. It kept staying on the 75° setting and never did anything. Returned immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Wendy W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size, easy to use. Great heat press
customer_reviews.text: I love this! It is so easy to use. It’s the perfect size to complete all size shirts in one press. Love the storage bag and heat shield tray that comes with it too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: Love this iron! This is helping me to make t-shirts way faster and nicer than my regular iron. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Won’t heat up
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this heat press for a few months. Now it randomly won’t heat up and I have to jump through hoops just to get any type of customer service regarding a replacement. It’s clearly under warranty and I don’t know what to do. I have orders that need made. Purchase another press that would be more convenient to deal with if something does go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Talanagram

customer_reviews.title: It can get hot very fast.
customer_reviews.text: My press do not work after three months, it will come on and the tempeture will be 489 and then a E2 will come up and it will turn it self off. I was wondering what should i do. When i first got it it work well, .I like it as a overall but, My press should be still working great been it is not 6months old not even a year.
customer_reviews.author: millicent j.

customer_reviews.title: My wife loves this addition to her cricut hobby.
customer_reviews.text: My wife loves this addition to her cricut hobby. she was already making t-shirts for the family and friends,, Happy wife ,, Happy life ))
customer_reviews.author: The Legendary Lingo

customer_reviews.title: SOOO EASY TO USE
customer_reviews.text: Suuuuuper simple to use! This is quality right here. You can't go wrong with the oversize heat press.

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: The product is big so it can cover my adult shirts with ease. It is not as helpful for small baby onesies. I would recommend the smaller version for that. It came with instructions for the first project. It was a bag to cover the press. I've had it for months and it's still working great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Totally worth the money
customer_reviews.text: This thing is outstanding...perfect for doing interfacing on material and for just ironing out fabric and designs...Highly recommended!

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!
customer_reviews.text: fast heat up, easy to use, sleek, and heavy enough that you don't have to use a bunch of pressure when pushing down like if you were using a standard iron. also big enough that I can get the entire section done in one shot rather than moving several times and over heating some spots.

customer_reviews.title: Nice product.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Xmas gift. My wife tried it and it worked great. She is looking forward to trying more with it and make cruise ship shirts.

customer_reviews.title: Love ❤️
customer_reviews.text: I love my Cricut Easy Press! I worked with some other colleagues to make shirts for our staff and it came in very handy to quickly press the shirts.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: Pass on this. You have to press hard on it to get your iron vinyl to stick. I thought you could set it and forget it. I was wrong. Buy another brand than Cricut. So disappointed.

customer_reviews.title: How to use it and what settings to use.

product_meta.title: Cricut Easy Press 2 - Heat Press Machine For T Shirts and HTV Vinyl Projects, Raspberry, 12" x 10"
product_meta.description: Ideal for jumbo size projects. Now with adjustable heat up to 400℉ (205 C). Cricut EasyPress 2 gives you professional iron on results in 60 seconds or less. Combining the speed of a heat press and the convenience of iron, EasyPress gives you fast and foolproof results that really stick, even after repeated washes. Eliminate guesswork with rigorously tested time and temperature settings for every project, apply gentle pressure, and when the beep sounds, you’re done! Helpful safety features include an insulated resting base and auto shutoff feature. EasyPress is lightweight, portable, easy to store, and compatible with major brands of heat transfer material. And of course, it’s a perfect complement to Cricut cutting machines.
feature_bullets: 12 inches x 10 inches size (30 centimeter x 25 centimeter) ideal for larger t shirts, sweatshirts, banners, blankets, and more
Professional iron on results in 60 seconds or less
Advanced heat plate design with ceramic coated surface
Precise temperature control upto 400 degree F (205 C). Just enter the recommended time and temperature settings for your HTV or Infusible Ink project
Easy to learn, simple to use. Requires maximum input 120V outlet; Not recommended for use outside North America

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.8 out of 5 stars1,153 ratings4.8 out of 5 stars
